feature.label: %featureName
feature.description:
This feature installs the ECF Remote Services XML-RPC Provider. The XML-RPC provider is an implementation that provides the distribution for Remote Services. For information about both Remote Services and the XML-RPC provider see
https://wiki.eclipse.org/ECF#OSGi_Remote_Services
